On Obstruction, Waiting, Irritation And Noise

Bells of mindfulness all. This ringing bell is calling out to me "Stop! Stop your conversation. Stop what you are doing. Bring awareness to your breathing. Release tension and return." This is a wonderful bell of mindfulness for me because...

Author: Chaim Finkelman
